Sentences with descriptive adjectives
  • sentences-with-descriptive-adjectives
Aug 6, 2022

10 oraciones con adjetivos descriptivos

1- This coffee is hot.

2- The soda is cold.

3- This is a long trip.

4- The trash is empty.

5- The car is fast.

6- The dog is big.

7- The cat is small.

8- He is strong.

9- She is weak.

10- This is a good day.
